stimulusHtml: Assume that firms providing health-care services to older people operate in a perfectly competitive market. What must happen in the market for health-care workers if there is an increase in the number of older people in a country?
choicesHtml: The demand for health-care workers will increase.
The marginal factor cost in the health-care industry will decrease.
The number of health-care workers will decrease.
The quality of health-care services will increase.
The wages of health-care workers will decrease.
